roleset.name: try to cure
roleset.note: NURSE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'nurse' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from nurse.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: This meant [*] returning to the golf course , where we watched a few French duffers maul the first tee while we sat under Cinzano umbrellas , me nursing an espresso and my ego [*T*-1].

example.name: with a manner adverbial
example.text: In that case , Guber Peters acquired the rights in 1979 , nursed the movie through a dozen scripts , and were on the set in London for 11 months [*-1] hovering over the most minute changes in casting and production .

example.name: Both args
example.text: Ben's nursing of his patients undergoing chemotherapy helped them deal with the side effects of their treatment.

roleset.name: breastfeed, feeding by/with breast
roleset.note: NURSE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'nurse' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from nurse.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: Arg0,2
example.text: Recently we heard about how a mom was asked to leave a big named store in New York just because she was nursing her baby.

example.name: Arg0, Arg2
example.text: Jane's nursing of her baby took place mainly in the nursery.
